Título: Clasificación de las funciones del gobierno
Descripción: Un estándar que clasifica los propósitos de las actividades gubernamentales, desarrollada por la Organización para la Cooperación y el Desarrollo Económicos y publicada por la División de Estadística de las Naciones Unidas.

Título: EU Type of contracting authority (TED schema)
Descripción: The types of contracting authority within the domain of public procurement according to the legislation of the European Parliament. This scheme's codes match those in TED schema.

Título: EU Main activity of contracting entity (TED schema)
Descripción: The main activity of the contracting entity within the domain of public procurement according to the legislation of the European Parliament. This scheme's codes match those in TED schema.
Whether or not the buyer is a contracting entity within the domain of public procurement according to the legislation of the European Parliament.
The main activity of the contracting entity within the domain of public procurement according to the legislation of the European Parliament. This scheme's codes match those in eForms.
The type of the procuring authority within the domain of public procurement according to the legislation of the European Parliament. This scheme's codes match those in eForms.
